hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# wipe out workspace rm -rf *
# download deployment curl -o ticket-monster.war "http://nexus:8081/nexus/service/local/artifact/maven/content?g=org.jboss.examples&a=ticket-monster&v=LATEST&r=snapshots&e=war"
# download puppet config curl -o appconfig.pp "http://nexus:8081/nexus/service/local/artifact/maven/content?g=org.jboss.examples&a=ticket-monster&v=LATEST&r=snapshots&e=puppet"
# create Dockerfile cat >Dockerfile <<EOF FROM eap
USER root RUN rpm -ivh http://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppetlabs-release-el-6.noarch.rpm RUN yum -y install puppet
USER jbosseap ADD ticket-monster.war /home/jbosseap/eap/jboss-eap-6.3/standalone/deployments/ticket-monster.war ADD appconfig.pp /tmp/appconfig.pp
USER root RUN puppet apply /tmp/appconfig.pp EOF
# pack docker image definition tar zcf dockerfile.tar.gz ticket-monster.war appconfig.pp Dockerfile
# build docker image curl -v -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/tar" --data-binary '@dockerfile.tar.gz' "$DOCKER_API/build?t=eap-ticket-monster-prod-$BUILD_NUMBER"
# create container CONTAINER_ID=$(curl -v -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" "$DOCKER_API/containers/create?name=ticket-monster-prod-$BUILD_NUMBER" -d "{\"Image\":\"eap-ticket-monster-prod-$BUILD_NUMBER\"}" | jq .Id | tr -d "\"") HOSTNAME=$(curl -v -X GET "$DOCKER_API/containers/$CONTAINER_ID/json" | jq .Config.Hostname | tr -d "\"")
# start the container curl -v -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" "$DOCKER_API/containers/$HOSTNAME/start" -d "{\"PublishAllPorts\":true}"
EAP_HTTP_PORT=$(curl -X GET "$DOCKER_API/containers/$CONTAINER_ID/json" | jq '.NetworkSettings.Ports."8080/tcp"[0].HostPort' | tr -d "\"") EAP_MGMT_PORT=$(curl -X GET "$DOCKER_API/containers/$CONTAINER_ID/json" | jq '.NetworkSettings.Ports."9990/tcp"[0].HostPort' | tr -d "\"")
EAP_HTTP_URL=$(echo $DOCKER_API | sed "s/:[0-9]\{1,\}/:$EAP_HTTP_PORT/g") EAP_MGMT_URL=$(echo $DOCKER_API | sed "s/:[0-9]\{1,\}/:$EAP_MGMT_PORT/g")
